citation: Proclamation under the Electoral Amendment Act 2012 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Electoral Amendment Act 2012

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Electoral Amendment Act 2012 fix 11 February 2013 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

4 February 2013

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 6 February 2013

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
